CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 12, 1955, pg. 20, reads: "Famous TV Set for Laquilla's New Room - gift of Sylvania... picture includes James W. Lindberg, sales promotion manager; William W. Baker, sales manager; William G. Nunn, Pittsburgh Courier; Henry C. Givan Jr., president of C. R. Rogers Corp., wholesale distributors for Sylvania in this area, and Herman T. Smith, national sales consultant for Sylvania."
TitMainTitle: James W. Lindberg, William W. Baker, William G. "Bill" Nunn, Henry C. Givan Jr., and Herman T. Smith standing around Sylvania Halolight television set for Laquilla Foster, in Sylvania display with record players and TVs
